BIC: How big is Redhot?

Beachcomber turned suddenly, noticed Redhot again. He positioned himself
under Redhot's arm, to support him. He began to speak calmly, "No, it's
not my right to judge you worthy of being saved." he said, although a
bit disturbed by the voice, he knew he had heard it before. "I just do
what I feel is right, and letting anyone die isnt." he then thought
reflectivly. <Would Cliffjumper have done the same, or has he gone to
far from the Autobots path as well as the Maximals. Firedrill was still
young, and could be taught. They had to remember, war or no war, life is
precious. He hoped he was wrong.> Beachcomber hoped Redhot was strong
enough. "Do you have anyplace to go?" he asked, not sure what the next
course of actions was. He was now an outcast, and wondered what happened
to the other three he was with.
______________________________________________________________________
"May I suggest our next course of actions?" Cliffjumper asked. "We need
to find Beachcomber, then a temporary shelter, to start our fight from."
He metnioned alloud, as he kept driving slowly.
